name: Aperture Tag: The Paint Gun Testing Initiative
name_original: Aperture Tag: The Paint Gun Testing Initiative
description:
Aperture Tag: The Paint Gun Testing Initiative is a puzzle game developed by Aperture Tag Team. It was originally released in 2014. It was published by Aperture Tag Team. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
Aperture Tag: The Paint Gun Testing Initiative is available on PC. The game is sold via Steam.
